sql:statement.name: loadAllRequests
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT TRANSACTION_ID, REQUEST_KEY, REQUEST_STATUS FROM BCK_PROCESS_CHECKPOINT

sql:statement.name: loadAllByTransaction
sql:statement.sql:query: SELECT REQUEST_KEY, REQUEST_STATUS FROM BCK_PROCESS_CHECKPOINT WHERE TRANSACTION_ID = ?

sql:statement.name: insertRequest
sql:statement.sql:query: INSERT INTO BCK_PROCESS_CHECKPOINT (TRANSACTION_ID, REQUEST_KEY, REQUEST_STATUS) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

sql:statement.name: updateRequest
sql:statement.sql:query: UPDATE BCK_PROCESS_CHECKPOINT SET REQUEST_STATUS = ? WHERE TRANSACTION_ID = ? AND REQUEST_KEY = ?
